table-wrap-foot.p: VPA: valproic acid; VPM: valpromide; LTG: lamotrigine; CBZ: carbamazepine; TPM: topiramate; PIR: piracetam; OXC: oxcarbazepine; LEV: levetiracetam; GAS: gastrodin; TCM: traditional Chinese medicine; CPS: complex partial seizure; SPS: simple partial seizure; SGTCS: secondary generalized tonic-clonic seizure; *: has no medication for about 2 months; **: drug-naive; M: male; F: female
